name: Lionel Messi
bio: Lionel Messi is an Argentine professional footballer who plays as a forward for FC Barcelona and the Argentina national team. Widely regarded as one of the greatest footballers of all time, Messi has spent his entire professional career at Barcelona, where he has won numerous domestic and international titles, including four UEFA Champions League titles and ten La Liga titles. He is also the all-time top scorer for both Barcelona and La Liga.
